H3.text: when was the seat moved to the capitol. 1800

A4.text: the Capitol held its first session of the U.S. Congress with both chambers in session on November 17, 1800

A5.text: the 6th U.S. Congress convened there on November 17, 1800, moving the national capital from Philadelphia to Washington, D.C.
